description: Try our easy to follow Pork Souvlaki, Watermelon Pops And Greek Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Souvlaki wrap,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Egg free,Pork,Tomato,Watermelon,Peanut free
name: Pork Souvlaki, Watermelon Pops And Greek Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 small Lebanese cucumber, roughly chopped (for snack)

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: Soak 2 short wooden skewers in cold water for 20 minutes. Place pork, oregano and lemon juice in a small bowl and toss to combine. Set aside for 5-10 minutes to marinate. Thread pork and capsicum onto prepared skewers. Preheat chargrill or large non-stick frying pan over high heat. Lightly spray skewers with oil. Grill, turning, for 5-6 minutes or until cooked through. Set aside to cool. Wrap souvlaki with the bread and remove the skewer. Wrap in aluminium foil. Serve with tzatziki. Snack 1: For watermelon pops, cut watermelon into stars and thread onto short straws. Snack 2: For Greek salad, combine feta with tomato and cucumber.
